[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/aggregator/aggregator_set_authority_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Denial of Service] Can an attacker who gains temporary authority immediately set authority to an inaccessible address (e.g., @0x0), permanently locking the aggregator? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/aggregator/aggregator_set_authority_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Authority Check Timing] Does validate() check authority at call time or at validation time - can authority change between these moments in a multi-step transaction?
